bibl.title: Some Mummy Labels in the Metropolitan Museum of Art, New York.
Egyptian Religion: The Last Thousand Years. Studies Dedicated to the Memory of Jan Quaegebeur. Part I
bibl.author: VLEEMING, S.P.

bibl.note: Collection of 11 mummy labels (its Greek part is published; its Egyptian part was unpublished). - 3. Inv. 10.130.1132 (Greek/dem.) = S.B. I, 5625. - 4. Inv. 10.130.1131 (Greek/dem.) = S.B. I, 5624. - 7. Inv. 10.130.1130 (Greek) = S.B. I, 5623. - 10. Inv. 96.9.237 (Greek) = S.B. I, 4285 = 5622. - 11. Inv. 32.8.14 (Greek) = S.B. XII, 10962.
bibl.seg: VLEEMING S.P., Some Mummy Labels in the Metropolitan Museum of Art, New York.

Willy CLARYSSE, Antoon SCHOORS and Harco WILLEMS (Edd.), Egyptian Religion: The Last Thousand Years. Studies Dedicated to the Memory of Jan Quaegebeur. Part I = Orientalia Lovaniensia Analecta. 84 (Leuven, 1998) pp. 477-515, 17 fac-sim., 2 tabl., 7 pll.
